title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 161.5 - Hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 161.5 - Hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations

The department shall accept requests for records and
produce records during regular business hours, which are 8:30 a.m. to 4:30
p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
161.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
